#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int l[100001],r[100001],b[100001];
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {

        int n,m,i,l1,r1;
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",b+i);
            l[i]=0;
            r[i]=0;
        }
        for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d%d",&l1,&r1);
            l[l1]++;
            r[r1]--;
        }
       int count=0;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            count+=l[i];
            b[i]+=count;
            count+=r[i];
            printf("%d ",b[i]);
        }
     printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
